title: Terry Riley - A Rainbow In Curved Air (1969) Reissue (2012)
description:
Terry Riley

A Rainbow In Curved Air

1969

2012 Reissue



CD / 2012 / VBR-V0



TRACK LIST:

1.	A Rainbow In Curved Air

2.	Poppy Nogood And The Phantom Band



"I am taken away to distant suns with psychedelic worlds. Colors explode and wash together in a maelstrom of unrestrained joy. I think of the persistent beats of distant pulsars guiding the way for a whole humanity reaching across the great expanse of space to discover places and ideas not yet even dreamed of in this world." 



:)
